data.text: Bere a Awurade gyee Dawid fii nʼatamfo nyinaa ne Saulo nsam akyi no, ɔtoo saa dwom yi de yii Awurade ayɛ.
Nsɛm a ɛwɔ dwom no mu ni:
me Nyankopɔn yɛ me botan; ne mu na minya guankɔbea.
“Misu frɛ Awurade; ɔno na ayeyi sɛ no,
Owu asorɔkye twaa me ho hyiae;
Ɔda mu hama kyekyeree me;
“Na mʼamanehunu mu no, misu frɛɛ Awurade.
Na asase wosowee na ehinhimii;
Wusiw fii ne hwene mu;
Ofii ɔsoro baa fam;
Ɔte kerubim so tui;
Ɔde sum kataa ne ho hyiae,
Hann kɛse hyerɛn wɔ nʼanim,
Awurade bobɔɔ mu fi ɔsoro;
Ɔtow nʼagyan maa nʼatamfo hwetee;
Awurade kasae,
“Ofi ɔsoro baa fam besoo me mu;
Ogyee me fii mʼatamfo a wɔyɛ den nsam,
Wɔbaa me so wɔ mʼamanehunu da,
Ɔde me baa baabi a bammɔ wɔ;
“Awurade atua me papayɛ so ka;
Efisɛ manantew Awurade akwan so;
Ne mmara nyinaa gu mʼanim;
Me ho nni asɛm wɔ Onyankopɔn anim;
Awurade tuaa me papayɛ so ka,
“Woda wo ho adi sɛ ɔnokwafo kyerɛ wɔn a wodi nokware,
Wuyi wo kronkronyɛ kyerɛ ɔkronkronni,
Wugye ahobrɛasefo,
Wo Awurade, woyɛ me kanea.
Wʼahoɔden mu, metumi aka asraafokuw agu;
“Onyankopɔn de, nʼakwan yɛ pɛ;
Hena ne Onyankopɔn, gye sɛ Awurade?
Onyankopɔn ne mʼaban a ɛyɛ den;
Ɔma mʼanammɔn ho yɛ hare sɛ ɔforote de;
Osiesie me ma ɔko;
Woama me wo nkwagye kyɛm.
Woabɔ kwan tɛtrɛɛ ama mʼanan
“Metaa mʼatamfo sɛee wɔn;
Meyam wɔn, mebɔɔ wɔn hwee fam, na wɔantumi ansɔre;
Wohyɛɛ me ahoɔden maa ɔko;
Womaa wɔdan wɔn ani guanee,
Wosu pɛɛ mmoa, nanso obiara ammegye wɔn.
Meyam wɔn ma wɔyɛɛ sɛ asase so mfutuma;
“Womaa me nkonimdi wɔ wɔn a wɔbɔ me kwaadu so.
Ananafo brɛ wɔn ho ase ma me;
Wɔn nyinaa bɔ huboa,
“Awurade te ase! Ayeyi nka me botan,
Ɔno ne Onyankopɔn a ɔtɔ wɔn a wɔhaw me so were;
na ogye me fi mʼatamfo nsam.
Awurade eyi nti, mɛkamfo wo wɔ amanaman mu, Ao Awurade.
“Wode nkonimdi akɛse ama wo hene;
